name: Seals inoperative
text: §490:2-203  Seals inoperative.  The affixing of a seal to a writing evidencing a contract for sale or an offer to buy or sell goods does not constitute the writing a sealed instrument and the law with respect to sealed instruments does not apply to such a contract or offer. [L 1965, c 208, §2-203; HRS §490:2-203]
